mapper.select: select f.id, f.genre_type, p.post_title, p.post_content, p.post_type, p.member_profile_id, p.created_date, p.updated_date , mp.profile_nickname, mp.member_id, m.profile_img_url , fl.file_name, fl.file_size, fl.file_type, fl.file_path from tbl_funding f join tbl_post p on f.id = p.id and p.post_type = 'VIDEO' join tbl_member_profile mp on p.member_profile_id = mp.id join tbl_member m on mp.member_id = m.id and m.id = #{memberId} join tbl_post_file pfl on p.id = pfl.post_id join tbl_file fl on pfl.id = fl.id order by f.id desc limit #{workAndFundingPagination.startRow}, #{workAndFundingPagination.rowCount};

select count(*) from tbl_funding f join tbl_post p on f.id = p.id and p.post_type = 'VIDEO' join tbl_member_profile mp on p.member_profile_id = mp.id join tbl_member m on mp.member_id = m.id and m.id = #{memberId};
